snippet.title: Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer® Wii Game Trailer
snippet.description: For over 40 years, Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer has delighted and captured the hearts of children everywhere.   Now for the first time ever, this timeless Holiday Classic has come to the Nintendo DS and Wii!  You can play with Rudolph and all his friends and help save Christmas!  Build toys in Santa's workshop, Help Santa deliver toys to all the good boys and girls and don't forget Mrs. Claus, she needs your help baking cookies! Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer makes the perfect Holiday Gift with fun for the entire family.  Available online or at a retailer near you.
